content: I'd like to nominate https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/84409 for backporting. It addresses a test failure (in a tier 2 target) from https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/83416 which did already get into beta.
@Jethro I've added the beta-nomination label. Next week will be on the table of the compiler (or libs) team
I'd like to nominate https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/85340 for backporting, as it fixed an out of bounds access
